scenes.description: Montage of fan messages and illustrations celebrating Shirakami Fubuki's 1st solo live.
Pre-concert announcement screen indicating the performance will start soon.
Safety and conduct guidelines for the concert audience.
Showcase of exclusive merchandise available for the 1st solo live.

subtitles.original: FBKINGDOM ANTHEM - Shirakami Fubuki 1st Solo Live -
subtitles.english: FBKINGDOM ANTHEM - Shirakami Fubuki 1st Solo Live -

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: 白上フブキ1stソロライブ 受注生産グッズ
subtitles.english: Shirakami Fubuki 1st Solo Live: Made-to-order Goods
